effect.scarlet_violet: For five turns, protects all Pokémon on the ground from major status ailments and confusion and weakens dragon moves used against them to 0.5× their power. Changes nature power to moonblast.
effect.the_teal_mask: For five turns, protects all Pokémon on the ground from major status ailments and confusion and weakens dragon moves used against them to 0.5× their power. Changes nature power to moonblast.
effect.the_indigo_disk: For five turns, protects all Pokémon on the ground from major status ailments and confusion and weakens dragon moves used against them to 0.5× their power. Changes nature power to moonblast.
effect.legends_za: For five turns, protects all Pokémon on the ground from major status ailments and confusion and weakens dragon moves used against them to 0.5× their power. Changes nature power to moonblast.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: For five turns, protects all Pokémon on the ground from major status ailments and confusion, and halves the power of incoming dragon moves.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: For five turns, protects all Pokémon on the ground from major status ailments and confusion, and halves the power of incoming dragon moves.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: For five turns, protects all Pokémon on the ground from major status ailments and confusion, and halves the power of incoming dragon moves.
short_effect.legends_za: For five turns, protects all Pokémon on the ground from major status ailments and confusion, and halves the power of incoming dragon moves.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: This protects Pokémon on the ground from status conditions and halves damage from Dragon-type moves for five turns.
